page.title: 19People who help.
page.content: There is a police station in Whitchurch,but it is not manned all hours during the week,it is open for a couple of hours on certain days of the week.If something serious happens then the police in Basingstoke must be informed.The town used to be cared for by the Andover area. The town does have a doctor's surgery and the area is looked after by a group practice consisting of three doctors.These look after the health of not only the people in the town but of the surrounding villages.The surgery is open every morning and afternoon during weekdays.
